SimulatedTime 
  protected static double SimulatedTime
ReadyQueue 
  protected static SimulationProcessList ReadyQueue

CurrentTime 
  public static double CurrentTime()
Return the current simulation time.

reset 
  public static void reset()
This routine resets the simulation time to zero and removes all entries from the scheduler queue (as their times may no longer be valid). Whatever operation caused the processes to become suspended will raise the RestartSimulation exception, which the application should catch. It should then perform any work necessary to put the process back in a state ready for restarting the simulation before calling Cancel on the process.

simulationReset 
  public static boolean simulationReset()
Is the simulation undergoing a reset?

stopSimulation 
  public static void stopSimulation()
Stop the simulation.

startSimulation 
  public static void startSimulation()
Start the simulation either from the start or from where it was previously stopped.

simulationStarted 
  protected static boolean simulationStarted()
